Module: Soap

Collection of SOAP protocol related functions doing the basic SOAP stuff such as creating envelopes, sending data to player via POST and handles the response.
Since:
  • 2020-11-08
Author:
  • Henning Klages
Source:

(static) sendToPlayerV1(baseUrl, endpoint, serviceName, actionIdentifier, args)

Send http request in SOAP format to specified player.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
baseUrl string http address including http prefix and port such as 'http://192.168.178.30:1400'
endpoint string SOAP endpoint such as '/MediaRenderer/RenderingControl/Control'
serviceName string such as 'RenderingControl'
actionIdentifier string such as 'GetEQ'
args object such as { InstanceID: 0, EQType: "NightMode" },
